Description.Title: SnowMelt
Description.ExtendedDescription: STICS SnowMelt component (v1.0) computes daily snowmelt as the ratio of meltwater rate (M, mm water per day) to snow density (ps, kg/m3), returning zero when density is near zero. It produces snowmelt in meters and is designed for a daily time step, following STICS model conventions.
Description.ShortDescription: Computes daily snowmelt (m) as M/ps with a near-zero density guard.

Input.name: M
Input.description: snow in the process of melting
